name: Harrowing Chains
description:
Made for the spring 2023 game jam of SNHU's Game Design and Development club.

Control explanations available in-game.

Developers: 

Nicholas Sheppard: UI & GameCycle 

Liam Shelton: Combat & Controls 

Braden Burnett: Player & Enemy & Knife 

Kamron Paydarfar: Mocap, Animations & Props
